ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Quest Update
ygData.msgSnippet: i don t know, i just want to go home! ARGH hehe. actually i saw the shin greaves on eqlizer. they are definitely no drop.  i didn t ask the wife about the
ygData.messageBody:
i don't know, i just want to go home! ARGH hehe.
actually i saw the shin greaves on eqlizer. they are definitely no drop. i
didn't ask the wife about the carapce but i would assume every component we
need will be no drop, except mayeb the stones.

magic item lore item no drop
ac10
sv disease 5
WAR CLR PAL SHD BRD
ALL

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 13, 1999 3:55 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent Quest Update
>
>
> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> Were the basalt carapace and shin greaves NO DROP? Are they
> equippable by
> bards? If so, what are the stats?
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
>
>
> > called the wife. out of the 3 basalt gargoyles in the
> spider hall, one
> > dropped a basalt carapace her first pull. out of the shin
> ghoul knights
> > in
> > the bedroom, one dropped the shin greaves. i am liking
> this so far. now
> > the bad news. 7 sand giants, 5 Griffins, 3 Hill Giants and
> NO lambent
> > stones. argh. i told her to petition and make sure they
> are in the game.
> >
> >
> >
